title: Waves to and from a radio

content.question: A transmission tower sends waves that are received by a radio. The radio emits waves that are heard by a person. Which of the following claims about the waves is correct?

choices.label: Both types of wave need a medium to propagate.
The waves from the tower need a medium to propagate, but the waves emitted by the radio do not.
The waves emitted by the radio need a medium to propagate, but the waves from the tower do not.
Neither type of wave needs a medium to propagate.

content.answer: The waves emitted by the radio need a medium to propagate, but the waves from the tower do not.
